name: tycho-light-arc-syntax

0.1.0.name: Tycho-Light-Arc-Syntax
0.1.0.description: A syntax theme based on my other theme, the tycho-light-syntax. The only difference is that this theme has some colors from the famous Arc Theme, and it combines the two palettes.

metadata.description: A syntax theme based on my other theme, the tycho-light-syntax. The only difference is that this theme has some colors from the famous Arc Theme, and it combines the two palettes.
